item.Q:

2: to swell; distend
item.A:
涨 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 漲
1: zhǎng 2: zhàng
高涨 (高漲) gāozhǎng upsurge; (tensions etc) run high 涨价 (漲價) zhàngjìa appreciate; increase in price
